Name: The Frosty Planet Pack
Description: The Frosty Planet Pack features frozen biomes and elements useful in thermal regulation

Name: Ice Cave Biome
Description: The Ice Cave Biome's extremely low temperatures make thermal regulation the top priority.

Levels.Name: Disabled
Levels.Description: This biome will not be mixed in

Levels.Name: Likely
Levels.Description: This biome is very likely to be mixed in

Levels.Name: Guaranteed
Levels.Description: This biome will be mixed in, even if it causes a worldgen failure

Name: Cool Pool Biome
Description: The Cool Pool Biome's chilly landscape features plentiful Ethanol lakes, making it an excellent destination for a colony eager to gather fuel resources.

Name: Nectar Biome
Description: The snow-laden Nectar Biome is home to the massive Bonbon Tree. This complex plant produces Nectar, which can be refined into Sucrose and Steam.

Name: Ceres Fragment
Description:
A fragment of a frosty starting world with sub-zero temperatures throughout.

<smallcaps>Duplicants who work in sub-zero temperatures will need to wear or build warming equipment. Abundant natural fuel sources could lead to a well-powered colony.</smallcaps>
